text: Now that you've completed your concept checker, let's turn our attention to the playbook. In this entry of the playbook, what we're going to do is we're going to actually start using examples from the market and getting you to take a template which we've created specifically for you and I want you to complete that template based on the various elements Make sure you spend quite a bit of time doing this and don't rush through this because Getting this correct is going to help you a lot when we complete not just module one, but two and three This playbook entry will make up the basic understanding of volume profiles and how to use the tool being volume profile So using the profiles provided in the template complete the basic profile elements. Good luck
